mean_en: to represent what is normal for (something) :to be a good or typical example of (something)
word_etyma: typ =type模范 + ify表动词 →代表；作为…的典型；具有…的特点
short_phrase: typify the idea of a tropical island
sentence: This beach does really typify my 'tropical island' fantasy.
sentence_trans: 这个海滩完全符合我幻想中的“热带岛屿”的特点。
